remarks: Deduction for proving a submonoid.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Aug-2015.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Sep-2015.)
statement:
issubmd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` M ) $.
issubmd.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` M ) $.
issubmd.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` M ) $.
issubmd.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. Mnd ) $.
issubmd.cz $e |- ( ph -> ch ) $.
issubmd.cp $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) /\ ( th /\ ta ) ) ) -> et ) $.
issubmd.ch $e |- ( z = .0. -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
issubmd.th $e |- ( z = x -> ( ps <-> th ) ) $.
issubmd.ta $e |- ( z = y -> ( ps <-> ta ) ) $.
issubmd.et $e |- ( z = ( x .+ y ) -> ( ps <-> et ) ) $.
issubmd $p |- ( ph -> { z e. B | ps } e. ( SubMnd ` M ) ) $.
$d .+ z $.
$d .0. z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d M x y $.
$d ch z $.
$d et z $.
$d ph x y $.
$d ps x y $.
$d ta z $.
$d th z $.
